description:
Maruko comes up with a new game to play with Grandpa. Later, Yamane thinks hard to come up with a nickname for himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Houkago Nani Shite Asobu?" no Maki / "Yamane, Nickname de Yobaretai" no Maki
What Should We Play After School? / Yamane Wants to Be Called by His Nickname
「放課後何して遊ぶ?」の巻 / 「山根, ニックネームで呼ばれたい」の巻
